body.p: In developing those assumptions, an entity need not identify specific market participants. Rather, the entity shall identify characteristics that distinguish market participants generally, considering factors specific to all the following:

li.p: the principal (or most advantageous) market for the asset or liability; and
market participants with whom the entity would enter into a transaction in that market.
